Are you…
I'm older than you, so…

translation.en: [laughing] No, no, no.
My size and knowledge base actually makes me older than you,

I'm 35. -And you might be, like, 32. -[knock at door] -Come on. -[door opens]

-Hey. -Bella, that's Quil and Embry.

Uh, we're friends, you know.
-Ooh, burn. -[laughs]

Nope.
So you guys have girlfriends. That's awesome.

You want funny, Black? I'll give you funny.
-[clattering] -Jeez.

You're on.

He makes me feel better.
I mean, he makes me feel alive.

translation.en: The hole in my chest.
Well, when I'm with Jake, it's… …it's like it's almost healed.

translation.en: For a while.
[Jacob] So, Quil keeps asking to come over. I think he likes you a little too much.

translation.en: Well, I'm really not into the whole cougar thing, you know?

translation.en: I mean, how old was that Cullen guy anyway?
[Bella] But even Jake can't keep the dreams away.

translation.en: Bella, Bella. [shushing] -[panting] -You're okay. You're okay.

translation.en: Well, I thought this thing was starting to work, but… I guess not.

Hanging out with Jacob.
That seems to take your mind off things a bit, doesn't it?

translation.en: You know, sometimes…
…you gotta learn to love what's good for you.
translation.es: tienes que aprender a amarlo que es bueno para ti.

translation.en: You know what I mean?
Of course, what do I know?
I'm just a terminal bachelor.
Famous ladies' man.
Go to bed.
I love you.
If I told you I couldn't have fixed these bikes, what would you have said?
translation.es: De decirte que no podía arreglarlas,¿qué hubieses dicho?

translation.en: Are you doubting your mad skills?
No. Definitely not. I mean, they'll run fine.
It's just, uh…
Maybe if I was smart, I would have dragged out the rebuild a bit.
translation.es: de ser inteligente,hubiera demorado más en arreglarlas.

translation.en: If you told me you couldn't fix these bikes, I would say that that's really too bad,
translation.es: De haberme dicho eso,te hubiese dicho mala suerte,

translation.en: but that we're just gonna have to find something else to do.
translation.es: pero tendremos que encontraralgo más que hacer juntos.

-[distant shouting] -[Jacob] Yeah. Him and his cult.
Oh, my God.
Did you see that?
They're not really fighting, Bella. They're cliff diving.

A rush? [Jacob] Most of us jump from lower down.
We leave the showing off to Sam and his disciples.

I don't know.
[Jacob] They just think they run this place.

-Now look at him. -[Bella] That's Embry?
-Yeah. -What happened to him?
He missed some school.
Now, all of a sudden, he started following Sam around like a little puppy.

translation.en: Like he's waiting for me or something.

Well, you should just avoid him.
I try.
-You look scared. -I'm not.

translation.en: All right.
-[Jacob] Brake? -[Bella] That one.
Clutch? Good.
Gas.
[Jacob] Ready?
-[gasps] -Now slowly release the clutch.
[Edward] Bella.
Stop.
[Jacob] You all right?
I'm gonna go again. -[awkward chuckle] -[engine starts]
Hit the brake!
-I want to go again. -Are you trying to get yourself killed?
-I want to go again. -No, forget it.
No more bikes.
[Jacob] Man, your head.
-Yeah. -Oh, my God, I'm sorry.
What, you're apologizing for bleeding?
Yeah, I guess I am.
Well, it's just blood, Bella. No big deal.

What are you staring at?
-You're sort of beautiful. -[Jacob chuckles]
How hard did you hit your head?
-I don't know. -[chuckling]
[Jacob] Let's go.
[Angela] I did see something in the woods.
Totally. Baby, I believe you.
No, he doesn't. He's just trying to get lucky.

translation.es: No. Era negro como la noche y enorme.

Or an alien. You're lucky you didn't get probed. -[Eric laughs] -Oh, yeah.

[Bella] You know you're not the only one.
Um, my dad's been getting reports at the station.

…Bella's back.
Yeah, I guess so.
All right, that's… Well, welcome.
Um, so listen, you know, now that, you know, you're talking and, uh…
eating again, which, you know, gotta get that protein in there.

Cool, um… Let me see, we could check out, um…
[clicks tongue] Love Spelled Backwards Is Love.

[stammers] I mean, that's an action movie.
Yeah, it's perfect.
Um, guns, adrenaline.
It's my thing.

-Yeah? -Punch faces…

You like action movies?
Not really.
I heard it sucks. Bad.
You know, are you even old enough to see this movie?

Buying it, okay.
Jessica bailed, and Angela got the stomach flu,

-[gun cocks in movie] -[man 1] Put your gun down.

or I'm gonna blow both of your frickin' heads off.

And you think I'm sort of beautiful.

Feeling sick? Maybe you need to go to the hospital.

Jake. Jake, Jake, the movie's over. What are you doing?

Like, you feel like you have a fever. Are you okay?

I gotta go.
-[door closes] -Dude is weird.

Jake!
You cut your hair off?
And got a tattoo?

What?
Go away.
What happened to you?
What's wrong? Hey! What happened?
Did Sam get to you? Is that what's happening?

-Not anymore, Bella. -[man] Jacob!
Look, Bella…
we can't be friends anymore.
[stammering] Jake, I know that I've been… …hurting you.

It's not you.
It's not you, it's me, right? Really?

I'm not… good.

Not anymore.
This doesn't even matter, all right?
-This is over. -You can't break up with me.

I mean, you're my best friend.
You promised me.
I know.
I promised I wouldn't hurt you, Bella.
And this is me keeping that promise.

translation.en: [Bella] Alice,
things are…
Things are bad again.

Aren't you sort of, um…
a pet of theirs?

-Lie. -[gasps]

Lie better.

'Cause he's pretty protective.
But he's far away, isn't he?

She asked me to see if you were still under the protection of the Cullens.

translation.es: Cree que es justomatar a la pareja de Edward,

Edward would know who did it. And he'd come after you.

After all, how much could you mean to him
translation.es: Después de todo,¿cuánto puedes significar para él

Oh, Victoria won't be happy about my killing you.

-Painfully. -[breathes heavily]

You will feel nothing.
Edward, I love you.
-[growling] -[Laurent] I don't believe it.
Dad, I saw them. What's the matter?

-[Harry clears throat] -Wolves?

All right. Well… Harry?

I should go to the station.
Dad, you should… you should go.

[Jacob whispers] Bella!

[stammers] Look, I'm sorry.
-For what? -I wish I could explain.

translation.en: The story. The story about…
the cold ones.

We'll just leave. Just you and me.
You'd do that?
I would do it for you.
It's not something I can just run away from, Bella.

If I could.

[whispering] Jake.
[Bella] Edward, I'm scared.
[Edward] You should be.

I need to see him.
He's not in.
Look, I'm sorry, I really need to see him.
What did you do?
-What did you do? -[man] Hey!
-What did you do to him? -Easy.
-He didn't want this. -What did we do?

translation.en: What did he do, hmm? What'd he tell you?

translation.en: -Both of you, calm down. -Nothing.
He tells me nothing because he's scared of you.

-[Paul growling] -[Sam] Paul! Calm down now.
Bella!
-Run! -[growls]
Jake, run!
[Sam] Paul!
Hey. Take Bella back to Emily's place.

Who's this?

Save some for your brothers. And ladies first. Muffin?

translation.en: Um, he didn't say anything to me.
translation.es: A mí no me dijo nada.

translation.en: That's a wolf thing.
Alpha's orders get obeyed whether we want 'em to or not.
translation.es: Las órdenes se obedecenpase lo que pase.

translation.en: Oh, and check it out. We can hear each other's thoughts.
translation.es: ¡Y oye ésta!Oímos los pensamientos de otros.

translation.en: Would you shut up? These are trade secrets.
Damn it! This chick runs with vampires.
translation.es: ¿Podrías callarte?Éstos son secretos. ¡Maldición! Está asociada con los vampiros.

translation.en: You can't really run with vampires.
translation.es: No puedes alcanzar a un vampiro.

translation.en: 'Cause they're fast.
Yeah? Well, we're faster.
Freaked out yet?
You're not the first monsters I've met.
translation.es: No sonlos primeros monstruos que conozco.

translation.en: Jake's right. You're good with weird.
translation.es: Jake tiene razón.Te gustan las cosas raras.

translation.en: Sorry.
So you're a werewolf.
Yeah. Last time I checked.
A few lucky members of the tribe have the gene.
translation.es: Unos pocos afortunados de la tributienen el gen.

translation.en: If a bloodsucker moves into town, then the fever sets in.
translation.es: Un chupa sangre se muda al pueblo,la fiebre aparece.

translation.en: Yeah, I wish.
Well, can't you find a way to just… stop?
translation.es: ¿No puedes buscar la manera de evitarlo?

translation.en: I mean, it's wrong.
It's not a lifestyle choice, Bella.
translation.es: No es algo que uno escoge.

translation.en: I was born this way, I can't help it.
You're such a hypocrite. What, I'm not the right kind of monster for you?
translation.es: Eres una hipócrita. ¿Qué?¿No soy el monstruo adecuado para ti?

translation.en: It's not what you are.
It's what you do. They never hurt anybody.
translation.es: Es lo que haces.Ellos no lastiman a nadie.

translation.en: -You've killed people, Jake. -Bella.
translation.es: Has matado gente. Bella, no hemos matado a nadie.

translation.en: We're not killing anyone.
translation.es: Bella, no hemos matado a nadie.

translation.en: Then who is?
What we're trying to protect you people from.
translation.es: Aquellos de quienes tratamosde protegerlos a ustedes,

translation.en: The only thing we do kill.
Vampires.
Wait, Jake, you can't.
Don't worry, we can't touch your little precious Cullens
translation.es: No te preocupes,no podemos tocar a tus preciosos Cullen

translation.en: unless they violate the treaty.
translation.es: a no ser que violen el tratado.

translation.en: I… It's not what I'm saying. [stutters]
You can't kill vampires. They'll…
They'll kill you.
Really? We took out that leech with the dreads easy enough.
translation.es: Bien fácil que acabamoscon esa sanguijuela con trenzas.

translation.en: Laurent?
And his red-headed girlfriend is next.
translation.es: Y su novia, la pelirroja, es la siguiente.

translation.en: Vic… Victoria is here?
translation.es: Y su novia, la pelirroja, es la siguiente. ¿Victoria está aquí?

translation.en: Was. We chased her all the way to the Canadian border the other night.
translation.es: Estaba. La perseguimoshasta la frontera la otra noche.

translation.en: She keeps coming back. We don't know what she's after.
translation.es: Pero siempre regresa.No sabemos qué es lo que quiere.

translation.en: I do.
Me.
Don't worry. We've got this place covered.
translation.es: No te preocupes.Estamos protegiendo tu casa.

translation.en: She won't get near you or Charlie.
translation.es: No se acercará ni a ti ni a Charlie.

translation.en: Look, you gotta be careful.
She's fast. You don't know how fast she is.
translation.es: Es rápida.No sabes lo rápida que es.

translation.en: You know, your lack of confidence in us is a little insulting.
translation.es: Tu falta de confianza en nosotroses un poco ofensiva.

translation.en: All right, I better go.
You gotta go.
[Jacob] Yeah.
Got a vampire to kill.
[Bella] Alice, I'm all right.
Until I'm alone.
And lately, that's all the time.
translation.es: Y últimamente, es todo el tiempo.

translation.en: Jacob's gone, he's hunting Victoria.
translation.es: Jacob se fue a cazar a Victoria.

translation.en: And Charlie's hunting Jacob.
translation.es: Y Charlie está cazando a Jacob.

translation.en: And you're gone.
And so is Edward.
And there's just nothing now.
You got something, Harry?
Nope, nothing.
[Bella] But I realize where I have to go.
translation.es: Pero sé adónde tengo que ir,

translation.en: What I have to do to see him again.
translation.es: lo que debo hacer para verlo.

translation.en: [Edward] Don't do this.
You wanted me to be human.
Watch me.
[Edward] Please.
For me.
You won't stay with me any other way.
[Edward] Bella, please.
[Jacob] Breathe.
Breathe.
Come on, Bella. Breathe.
Bella. Bella, can you hear me?
-Jake? -[sighs]
Come here.
[Jacob] What the hell were you thinking?
I just wanted to see something.
Get her home! I'm gonna go help out over at Harry's place.
translation.es: ¡Llévala a su casa! Yo iré a casa de Harry.

translation.en: [Bella] What happened at Harry's?
Harry Clearwater had a heart attack.
Charlie and my dad are over at his place with his family.
translation.es: Charlie y mi papá están con su familia.

translation.en: Is he okay?
He's gone.
Come on. I'll get you something dry and drive you home.
translation.es: Te conseguiré algo de ropa secay te llevaré a tu casa.

translation.en: Hundred and eight degrees over here.
God.
My hands are freezing.
It must be nice never getting cold.
translation.es: Debe ser muy lindo nunca tener frío.

translation.en: It's a wolf thing.
It's not. It's a Jacob thing.
You're just warm.
You're like your own sun.
[Jacob] Is this better? Now that you know about me.
translation.es: ¿Es mejor así?Ahora que sabes de mí.

translation.en: But…
You saw what happened to Emily.
translation.es: Viste lo que pasó con Emily.

translation.en: Sam got angry.
Lost it for a split second…
translation.es: Perdió el control por un segundo.

translation.en: Em was standing too close.
He'll never be able to take that back.
What if I got mad at you?
Sometimes…
I feel like I'm gonna disappear.
translation.es: siento como si fuera a desaparecer.

translation.en: Okay, not that you need me to tell you something like this.
translation.es: No es como si necesitaras que te lo dijera,

translation.en: But I always will. You're not gonna lose yourself.
translation.es: pero siempre lo haré.No vas a desaparecer.

translation.en: I wouldn't let that happen.
How?
I'll tell you all the time…
how special you are. [chuckles]
Thank you. For everything.
-Wait. -[gasps]
There's a vampire.
How do you know?
I can smell it. I'm getting you out of here.
translation.es: Puedo olerlo. Te sacaré de aquí.

translation.en: [Bella] That's Carlisle's car.
They're here.
Bella, it's a trick. Stop! -You gotta come with me. -[grunts]
They won't hurt me.
Look, if a Cullen is back here, this is their territory.
translation.es: Si un Cullen ha regresado,éste es su territorio.

translation.en: Treaty says we can only defend on our own lands.
-I can't protect you here. -Okay, it's okay. You don't have to.
translation.es: - que no puedo protegerte ahí.- Está bien. No necesitas hacerlo.

translation.en: You're about to cross a line.
Then don't draw one. Please?
Alice?
-Oh, my God. -[Alice] Bella.
I'm sorry, I just-- I can't believe you're here. Is… [stutters]
translation.es: Disculpa. No puedo creer que estés aquí.

translation.en: Would you like to explain to me how you're alive?
What?
I saw a vision of you. You jumped off a cliff.
translation.es: Tuve una visión. Te vi saltar del acantilado.

translation.en: Why in the hell would you try and kill yourself?
-I mean, what about Charlie? What about-- -I didn't try to kill myself.
I was cliff jumping. Recreationally.
It was fun. [sniffling]
I have never met anyone more prone to life-threatening idiocy.
translation.es: Jamás conocí a alguientan propensa al suicidio estúpido.

translation.en: Did you… did you tell him?
He only calls in once every few months.
translation.es: Sólo llama una vez cada tantos meses.

translation.en: He said he wants to be alone.
Bella, what is that god-awful wet dog smell?
translation.es: ¿Qué demonios esese olor a perro mojado?

translation.en: Um… that's probably me.
Or it's Jacob.
[Alice] Jacob who?
Jacob's kind of a werewolf.
translation.es: Jacob es una especie de hombre lobo.

translation.en: Bella! Werewolves are not good company to keep.
translation.es: ¡Bella! Los lobos no son buena compañía.

translation.en: Speak for yourself.
I had to see you were safe.
translation.es: Quería asegurarme de que estabas a salvo.

translation.en: I thought you couldn't protect me here.
translation.es: Creí que no podías protegerme aquí.

translation.en: Guess I don't care.
[Alice] Well, I'm not going to hurt her.
No, you're just a harmless Cullen.
I'm talking about the other bloodsucker who tried to kill Bella because of you.
translation.es: Me refiero al otro chupa sangreque intentó matarla.

translation.en: -Victoria? -Yeah, Victoria's been around.
translation.es: ¿Victoria? Sí, Victoria ha estado por aquí.

translation.en: I didn't see her.
I didn't see you get pulled out of the water either.
translation.es: Ni tampoco vi cuando la rescataron a ella.

translation.en: I can't see past you and your pack of mutts.
translation.es: No puedo ver más allá de ti y tus perros.

translation.en: -Don't get me upset. -Hey, stop.
translation.es: No me hagas enojar. - Detente.- Las cosas se pondrán feas.

translation.en: -Or things are gonna get very ugly. -Stop, stop. Stop, stop.
translation.es: - Detente.- Las cosas se pondrán feas.

translation.en: I'll give you a minute.
You're not going anywhere, you're gonna come back, right?
translation.es: No irás a ninguna parte. Vas a regresar. - ¿Correcto?- En cuanto te deshagas del perro.

translation.en: As soon as you put the dog out.
translation.es: - ¿Correcto?- En cuanto te deshagas del perro.

translation.en: Is he…?
Are there others? How many Cullens are here,
and how long are they staying?
It's just Alice. [sniffs]
And she can stay as long as she'd like.
translation.es: Y puede quedarse cuanto tiempo quiera.

translation.en: Are the rest coming back?
Not that I know of. [scoffs]
Anything else?
That's it.
Well, if that's all, then you'd better go run back to Sam.
translation.es: Si eso es todo, regresa corriendo con Sam.

translation.en: I've done it again.
[Jacob] I keep breaking my promise.
translation.es: No dejo de romper mi promesa.

translation.en: We don't have to do this to each other.
translation.es: No tenemos por qué hacernos esto.

translation.en: Yes, we do.
Swan residence.
He's not here right now.
He's arranging a funeral.
translation.es: Está haciendo los arreglos para un funeral.

translation.en: Who was that?
What?
Always in the way.
-Who was that? -Bella, step back.
-Jake, who was that? -Bella.
Bella, it's Edward. He thinks you're dead.
translation.es: - ¿Quién era?- Edward. Cree que estás muerta.Rosalie le dijo por qué vine.

translation.en: [Alice] Rosalie told him why I came here.
translation.es: Cree que estás muerta.Rosalie le dijo por qué vine.

translation.en: Why would you… Why didn't you let me speak to him?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no dejaste que le hablara?

translation.en: -He didn't ask for you. -I don't care!
translation.es: No pidió por ti. - ¡No me importa!- Va al Volturi.

translation.en: Bella, he's going to the Volturi.
He wants to die too.
[Jacob] He left you, Bella. He didn't want you anymore, remember?
translation.es: Te abandonó. Ya no te quería.¿Recuerdas?

translation.en: No, I'm not gonna let him kill himself out of guilt.
translation.es: No permitiré que se matepor sentirse culpable.

translation.en: Well, what about your dad?
I'm 18. I'm legally free to go and I left a note.
translation.es: Tengo 18.Legalmente, puedo irme, y le dejé una nota.

translation.en: -Please, Bella. -[key jingles]
Just… stay here.
[Jacob] For Charlie.
For me.
I have to go.
I'm begging you.
Please.
Goodbye, Jacob.
So you've made up your minds.
I'm afraid your particular gifts…
are too valuable to destroy.
[clicks tongue] But if you're unhappy with your lot, join us.
translation.es: Pero si tu clan te hace infeliz,únete a nosotros.

translation.en: We would be delighted to utilize your skills.
Won't you consider staying with us?
You know it will happen anyway.
translation.es: Sabes que ocurrirá de todas formas.

translation.en: Not without cause.
Such a waste.
I'm guessing you didn't rent this car?
I figured you wouldn't be opposed to grand theft auto.
translation.es: Me imaginéque no te opondrías a un auto robado.

translation.en: [Bella] Not today.
What? What do you see?
They refused him.
So…
He's gonna make a scene. Show himself to the humans.
translation.es: - ¿Y?- Va a armar un escándalo. - Revelarse a los humanos.- ¡No! ¿Cuándo?

translation.en: [Bella] No! When?
[Alice] He's gonna wait until noon, when the sun's at its highest. -[grunting] -[sighs]
translation.es: Esperará hasta el sol de mediodía.

translation.en: -Alice, you gotta hurry up. -There's Volterra.
translation.es: Cielos. Debes apresurarte, Alice. Ahí está Volterra.

translation.en: -Why are they all in red? -San Marco's Day festival.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué están de rojo?- Festival de San Marcos.

translation.en: They're commemorating the expulsion of vampires from the city.
translation.es: Conmemoran la expulsiónde los vampiros de la ciudad.

translation.en: It's the perfect setting.
The Volturi will never let him get far enough to reveal himself.
translation.es: Los Volturi jamás se lo permitirán.

translation.en: We have five minutes.
-[panting] -You know, Bella, just breathe.
-Alice. -Bella,
you're the only one he can't see coming.
translation.es: Eres la única capaz de sorprenderlo.

translation.en: If I go, he'll read my thoughts. He'll think I'm lying.
translation.es: Él leería mis pensamientosy creería que estoy mintiendo.

translation.en: -He'll rush into it. -Where do I go?
translation.es: Él leería mis pensamientosy creería que estoy mintiendo. - ¿Adónde voy?- Debajo del reloj de la torre. ¡Ve!

translation.en: [Alice] He'll be under the clock tower. Go!
translation.es: - ¿Adónde voy?- Debajo del reloj de la torre. ¡Ve!

translation.en: Don't!
[Edward] Heaven.
You have to move. [panting]
Open your eyes, look at me. I'm alive.
translation.es: Abre los ojos. Mírame. Estoy viva.

translation.en: You have to move. [breathes shakily]
-You're here. -I'm here.
You're alive.
Yes.
I needed to make you see me once.
translation.es: Necesitaba que me vieras una vez.

translation.en: You had to know I was alive,
you didn't have to feel guilty about anything.
translation.es: y que no debes sentirte culpable.

translation.en: I can let you go now.
translation.es: Ahora puedo dejar que te vayas.

translation.en: I never acted out of guilt.
I just couldn't live in a world where you don't exist.
translation.es: Sólo que no podía vivir en un mundo sin ti.

translation.en: Oh, but you said…
[Edward] I lied. I had to lie.
translation.es: - Pero dijiste...- Mentí. Tenía que mentir.Pero me creíste tan fácilmente.

translation.en: But you believed me so easily.
translation.es: Tenía que mentir.Pero me creíste tan fácilmente.

translation.en: Because it doesn't make sense for you to love me.
translation.es: Porque no tiene sentido que tú me ames.

translation.en: I'm a nothing human. Nothing.
Bella… …you're everything to me.
You're everything.
I won't be needing your services after all, gentlemen.
translation.es: No precisaré de sus serviciosdespués de todo.

translation.en: Aro wants to speak with you again.
No rules were broken.
Nonetheless, we should take this conversation to a more appropriate venue.
translation.es: No obstante, deberíamos discutirloen un lugar más apropiado.

translation.en: Fine.
Bella, why don't you go enjoy the rest of the festival.
translation.es: ¿Por qué no vasy disfrutas del resto del festival?

translation.en: - The girl comes with us. - No, you can go to hell.
translation.es: Ella viene con nosotros. No. Váyanse al infierno.

translation.en: Come on, guys.
It's a festival. You wouldn't want to make a scene.
translation.es: Es un festival.No quieren crear un alboroto.

translation.en: We wouldn't.
Enough.
Aro sent me to see what was taking so long.
translation.es: Aro me envió a averiguarpor qué tanta demora.

translation.en: Just do as she says.
Go ahead.
Don't be scared.
Are you?
Is she human? Yes.
Does she know?
Yes.
Then why would…
She wants to be.
And so she will be.
For dessert.
[Alec] Sister. Send you out to get one and you bring back two.
translation.es: Hermana, te envía a traer unoy regresas con dos.

translation.en: And a half.
-Such a clever girl. -What a happy surprise!
Bella is alive after all.
translation.es: Bella está con vida después de todo.

translation.en: Isn't that wonderful.
I love a happy ending.
They are so rare.
[Aro] Her blood appeals to you so much.
It makes me thirsty.
How can you stand to be so close to her?
translation.es: ¿Cómo puede estar tan cerca de ella?

translation.en: It's not without difficulty. Yes, I can see that. [laughs]
translation.es: - No es tan fácil.- Sí, me doy cuenta.

translation.en: Aro can read every thought I've ever had with one touch.
translation.es: Aro puede leertodos mis pensamientos con sólo tocarme.

translation.en: [Edward] And now you know everything.
So get on with it.
You are quite a soul reader yourself, Edward.
translation.es: Eres un lector de almas, Edward.

translation.en: Though… you can't read Bella's thoughts.
translation.es: Pero no puedes leerlos pensamientos de Bella.

translation.en: Fascinating.
I would love to see if… you are an exception to my gifts, as well.
translation.es: Me encantaría averiguar si también eresla excepción a mis talentos.

translation.en: Would you do me the honor?
Interesting.
I see nothing.
[Aro] I wonder if…
Let us see if she is immune to all our powers.
translation.es: Veamos si es inmunea todos nuestros poderes.

translation.en: Shall we, Jane?
Pain.
-[Bella] Stop! -[grunts]
[Bella] Don't, please stop.
[Bella shouting] Stop! Just stop hurting him, please! Please!
Jane?
-Master? -[grunts]
Go ahead, my dear.
This may hurt just a little.
Remarkable.
[Aro] She confounds us all.
So, what do we do with you now?
You already know what you're going to do, Aro.
translation.es: Ya sabes lo que vas a hacer, Aro.

translation.en: She knows too much.
She's a liability.
[Aro] That's true.
Felix.
-[cracks] -[Bella] Please! No. No, please, please!
Kill me, kill me. Not him.
[Aro] How extraordinary.
You would give up your life… for someone like us?
translation.es: Darías tu vida por alguien como nosotros.

translation.en: A vampire.
A soulless monster.
[Edward] Just get away from her.
You don't know a thing… about his soul.
translation.es: No sabes nada de su alma.

translation.en: [sighing] This is a sadness.
If only it were your intention to give her immortality.
translation.es: Si sólo fuera tu intenciónotorgarle la inmortalidad.

translation.en: [Alice] Wait!
Bella will be one of us.
I've seen it.
I'll change her myself.
Mesmerizing, to see what you have seen…
translation.es: Fascinante. Ver lo que has visto antes de que ocurra.

translation.en: before it has happened.
translation.es: Ver lo que has visto antes de que ocurra.

translation.en: Your gifts will make for an intriguing immortal.
translation.es: Tus dones harán de ella una inmortal intrigante,

translation.en: Go now.
Make your preparations.
Let us be done with this.
translation.es: Terminemos con esto de una vez.

translation.en: Heidi will arrive any moment.
Thank you… for your visit.
[Caius] We will return the favor.
I would advise that you follow through on your promise soon.
translation.es: Sugiero que cumplancon su promesa pronto.

translation.en: [Caius] We do not offer second chances.
[Aro] Goodbye, my young friends.
Nice fishing, Heidi.
Yes, they do look rather juicy.
Save some for me.
[Heidi] This way, please. Stay together.
translation.es: Por aquí, por favor. Manténganse juntos.

translation.en: Stop it, stop! [gasping]
You're here.
You can sleep.
I'll still be here when you wake up.
[Edward] Bella. The only reason I left…
translation.es: La única razón por la cual me fui

translation.en: was because I thought I was protecting you.
I needed you to have a chance
translation.es: Necesitaba que tuvieras la oportunidadde una vida normal, feliz.

translation.en: at a normal, happy life.
translation.es: tuvieras la oportunidadde una vida normal, feliz.

translation.en: It was so easy for you to leave.
Leaving you was the hardest thing I've done in 100 years.
translation.es: Dejarte fuelo más difícil que hice en 100 años.

translation.en: I swear…
…I will never fail you again.
I'm so sorry.
Charlie's coming.
You okay?
I'm fine.
Dad, you don't have to worry.
The last time you said that you took off.
translation.es: La última vez que dijiste eso,

translation.en: I didn't see you for three days.
translation.es: no te vi por tres días.

translation.en: I'm really sorry, Dad.
Bella… do not ever do that to me again.
Ever.
And you're grounded…
for the rest of your life.
translation.es: por el resto de tus días.

translation.en: We're not technically breaking any of his rules.
He did say I couldn't take a step inside the door.
translation.es: Dijo que no podía darun paso más allá de la puerta.

translation.en: I came in through the window.
He's not gonna forgive me easily.
No.
Can you?
I hope you can, 'cause I honestly don't know
translation.es: Espero que puedas, porque honestamente,no sé cómo vivir sin ti.

translation.en: how to live without you.
translation.es: porque honestamente,no sé cómo vivir sin ti.

translation.en: [Edward softly] Come here.
Once Alice changes me,
translation.es: Después de que Alice me convierta,

translation.en: you can't get rid of me.
She won't need to change you.
There are always ways to keep the Volturi in the dark.
translation.es: Hay formas de mantenerlooculto de los Volturi.

translation.en: You all know what I want.
translation.es: Todos saben que eso es lo que quiero.

translation.en: And I know how much I'm asking for.
translation.es: Y sé que estoy pidiendo mucho.

translation.en: The only thing that I can think of for it to be fair is to just vote.
translation.es: Lo único que se me ocurrepara que sea justo es votar.

translation.en: You don't know what you're talking about. Shut up.
translation.es: - No sabes lo que dices.- Cállate.

translation.en: Alice.
I already consider you my sister.
translation.es: Yo ya te considero mi hermana.

translation.en: - Yes. - Thank you.
I vote yes.
It would be nice to not want to kill you all the time.
translation.es: Sería agradableel no querer matarte todo el tiempo.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I'm really sorry to both of you how I've acted.
translation.es: Lamento muchísimocómo me comporté con ustedes.

translation.en: And I'm really grateful that you were brave enough
translation.es: Y te agradezco que tuvieras el valor de ir

translation.en: to go and save my brother.
But this isn't a life I would have chosen for myself.
translation.es: Pero ésta no esla vida que yo hubiera escogido.

translation.en: And I wish that there had been someone to vote no for me.
translation.es: Ojalá hubiese habido alguienque votara "no" por mí.

translation.en: So, no.
I vote hell, yeah. [laughs]
And we can pick a fight with these Volturi some other way.
translation.es: Podemos encontrar otra razónpara pelearnos con los Volturi.

translation.en: I already consider you a part of the family.
translation.es: Ya te considero parte de la familia.

translation.en: Yes.
Why are you doing this to me?
You know what this means.
You've chosen not to live without her, which leaves me no choice.
translation.es: Has escogido no vivir sin ella.No tengo alternativa.

translation.en: I won't lose my son.
[Bella] I'll wait until after graduation to make it easier on Charlie.
translation.es: Después de la graduación,para que le sea más fácil a Charlie.

translation.en: Edward, I want you to be the one to do it.
translation.es: Edward, quiero que seas tú quien lo haga.

translation.en: He wants to talk to me.
[Jacob] So you're still alive for now.
translation.es: Así que sigues viva por ahora.

translation.en: [Edward] He thinks it's me keeping you away.
translation.es: Cree que yo te alejo de él.

translation.en: [Jacob] You stay the hell out of my head.
translation.es: No te metas en mi cabeza.

translation.en: [Edward] Jacob… I know you have something to say to me.
translation.es: Jacob, sé que tienes algo que decirme.

translation.en: But I want to say something to you first, if that's all right.
translation.es: Pero primero quiero decirte algo yo.

translation.en: Thank you.
Thank you for keeping Bella alive when… I didn't.
translation.es: Gracias por mantener viva a Bellacuando yo no lo hice.

translation.en: No. You didn't.
And it wasn't for your benefit, trust me.
translation.es: Y no fue por ti que lo hice.

translation.en: I'm still grateful.
But I'm here now, and I'm not going to leave her side
translation.es: Pero ahora estoy aquí. No me iré hasta que ella me lo pida.

translation.en: until she orders me away.
translation.es: No me iré hasta que ella me lo pida.

translation.en: We'll see.
[Jacob] Hey. My turn to talk.
I'm here to remind you about a key point in the treaty.
translation.es: Vine a recordarteun punto clave del tratado.

translation.en: I haven't forgotten.
What key point?
If any of them bites a human, the truce is over.
translation.es: Si uno de ellos muerde a un humano, se acabó la tregua.

translation.en: What if I choose it? It has nothing to do with you.
translation.es: Si yo así lo decido,no tiene nada que ver contigo.

translation.en: No. No, I won't let you.
You're not gonna be one of them, Bella.
It's not up to you.
You know what we'll do to you. I won't have a choice.
translation.es: Sabes lo que te haremos.No tendré alternativa.

translation.en: -Bella, please come. -Wait.
Is he gonna hurt me? Read his mind.
Jake.
I love you.
So, please…
don't make me choose.
[Bella] 'Cause it'll be him.
It's always been him.
Bella.
Goodbye, Jacob. No, you don't speak for her.
translation.es: - Adiós, Jacob.- ¡Tú no hablas por ella!

translation.en: Bella, get out of here.
[Bella] Stop!
Stop!
You can't hurt each other without hurting me.
translation.es: No pueden lastimarse sin lastimarme a mí.

translation.en: [Edward] He's right.
You shouldn't become what I am.
translation.es: No deberías convertirte en lo que soy.

translation.en: I can't do this alone.
Then please just wait.
Just give me… five years.
That's too long.
Then three.
You're so stubborn.
What are you waiting for?
I have one condition.
If you want me to do it myself.
translation.es: si quieres que yo lo haga.

translation.en: What's the condition?
And then forever.
That's what I'm asking.
Marry me, Bella.
